item.title: [UNOFFICIAL] Ichikawa COVID-19 Information Site
item.description: Overview The website that provides the latest information on COVID-19 in Ichikawa. Changes in the number of Toei Subway passengers is also posted because Toei Shinjuku line is served in the city. It is lightweight, and built by Hugo, a fast static site generator. Screenshots Figure 1: Light theme Figure 2: Dark theme See also Website Repository
